mapper.sql: select id id, open_id openId, user_id userId, examine_status examineStatus, wx_head_img wxHeadImg, nick_name nickName, wx_phone_num wxPhoneNum, wx_gender wxGender, wx_app_id wxAppId, union_id unionId, is_deleted isDeleted, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified from open_user
mapper.update: update open_user set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
update open_user set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id in (#{item})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
insert into open_user ( open_id, user_id, examine_status, wx_head_img, nick_name, wx_phone_num, wx_gender, wx_app_id, union_id, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{openId}, #{userId}, #{examineStatus}, #{wxHeadImg}, #{nickName}, #{wxPhoneNum}, #{wxGender}, #{wxAppId}, #{unionId}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

insert into open_user ( open_id, user_id, examine_status, wx_head_img, nick_name, wx_phone_num, wx_gender, wx_app_id, union_id, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{openId}, #{userId}, #{examineStatus}, #{wxHeadImg}, #{nickName}, #{wxPhoneNum}, #{wxGender}, #{wxAppId}, #{unionId}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
